metadata.synopsis: The player arrives nears the edge of the left side of the roof as they are escaping the Lance explosion.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Use the debug command "oe cre_testlance" and take the Blood of Lathander from its place.While escaping go to 44; 30; 22

0.speaker: Player
0.text: No more roof. Time to get down from here.
